thread.title: Tanzania: Cyber Security Firm Offers Cash Incentive
thread.title_full: Tanzania: Cyber Security Firm Offers Cash Incentive

title: Tanzania: Cyber Security Firm Offers Cash Incentive
text:
Tanzania: More Dar Residents Turn Up to Register 
"We have been a 100 per cent channel driven company with partners playing an instrumental role in extending the company's reach and support. 
This offer is a gesture to acknowledge our partners' contributions and to further motivate them to secure more organisations with next generation securities from Cyberoam." she said. 
She added, "Normally such offers are targeted to partner companies. But this time we have moved a step further and considered sales representatives who actually sell our solutions." 
The virtual and hardware Cyberoam Central Console appliances offer centralised security management options to organisations, while Cyberoam iView allows intelligent logging and reporting with one-of-their kind, in-depth reports. Tanzania
